BiblioData.Title: Nitride semiconductor laser element
BiblioData.Abstract: A nitride semiconductor laser element having a first nitride semiconductor layer (11), an active layer (12), a second nitride semiconductor layer (13), a first protective film (25) in contact with a cavity end face of the nitride semiconductor laser, and a second protective film (26) formed on the first protective film (25), wherein the second protective film (26) has a thick part protruding from a face on the cavity end face side and from a face opposite the cavity end face.

Claims.P: 1. A nitride semiconductor laser element having a first nitride semiconductor layer, an active layer, a second nitride semiconductor layer, a first protective film in contact with a cavity end face of the nitride semiconductor layer, and a second protective film formed on the first protective film,
wherein the second protective film has a thick part protruding from a face on the cavity end face side and from a face opposite the cavity end face.
2. The laser element according to Claim 1, wherein the thick part of the second protective film is formed on an optical waveguide region of the cavity end face and nearby.

3. The laser element according to Claim 1 or 2, wherein a ridge is formed on the surface of the second nitride semiconductor layer, and the second protective film has the thick part under the ridge and nearby.
4. The laser element according to Claim 1, 2 or 3, wherein the thick part has a horizontally elliptical shape on the cavity end face.
5. The laser element according to any one of Claims 1 to 4, wherein the thick part has a thickness which is thick at least 5 % of the other part of the second protective film.
6. The laser element according to any one of Claims 1 to 5, wherein the thick part of the second protective film has the thickness of 1000 A to 3000 A.
7. The laser element according to any one of Claims 1 to 6, wherein the second protective film is formed of oxides.

8. The laser element according to any one of Claims 1 to 7, wherein the surface area of the thick part formed on a face on the cavity end face side is smaller than the surface area of the thick part formed on the opposite face.

9. The laser element according to any one of Claims 1 to 8, wherein the first protective film has a region in contact with at least the active layer of the cavity end face, and the thickness of the region is thinner than the maximum thickness of the first protective film.
10. The laser element according to any one of Claims 1 to 9, wherein the first protective film is formed of a material having a hexagonal system crystal structure.

11. The laser element according to any one of Claims 1 to 10, wherein the first protective film has a crystal structure that has the same axial orientation as that of the nitride semiconductor layer constituting the end face of the cavity.
12. The laser element according to any one of Claims 1 to 11, wherein the end face of the cavity is the M-plane(1-100), A-plane(11-20), C-plane(0001) or R-plane(1-102).
